title.narrative: Expanding spiny lobster aquaculture in Indonesia

description.narrative: Spiny lobster farming in Indonesia has, in the past 5 years, taken two steps forward and one step back. Availability of lobster seed in Indonesia has expanded , the capacity of lobster fishers and farmers has increased, and the opportunity for a large industry employing whole coastal communities is stronger than before. The development objective of this project is to expand all phases of the lobster farming industry in Indonesia, so that local communities and the country maximise the benefits afforded by the comparatively abundant supply of lobster seed. The project team will develop nursery and juvenile management techniques, formulate functional and cost-effective artificial diets, identify business models and quantitatively assess the socio-economic benefits of lobster farming.
